Package homework1

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • homework1.Animator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Animator
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Main application class for exercise #1. This application allows the user to add shapes to a graphical window and to animate them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animator

        public Animator​()
        Modifies:
        this
        Effects:
        Initializes the GUI and enables a timer that steps animation of all shapes in this 25 times per second while animation checkbox is selected.

      • paint

        public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Overrides:
        paint in class java.awt.Window
        Modifies:
        g
        Effects:
        Paint this including all its shapes to g. This method is invoked by Swing to draw components. It should not be invoked directly, but the repaint method should be used instead in order to schedule the component for redrawing.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

        Modifies:
        this
        Effects:
